Class ChatLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.game.objects.chatbox.ChatLine

  • public class ChatLine
extends java.lang.Object
    This handles one line of text in the chatview
    Version:
    February 2019
    Author:
    Spencer Imbleau

      • ChatLine

        public ChatLine(int icon,
                int type,
                int ttl,
                long sent,
                java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String message)
        Initialize a chat line
        Parameters:
        icon - - the icon identifier
        type - - the type of the message
        sent - - the time in nanoseconds when this message was sent
        ttl - - the time in seconds for this message to display
        name - - the name of the player who messaged
        message - - the message sent by the player

        public static Image getChatPortrait(ChatIcon icon,
                                    java.lang.String username)
        Build and return a chatline portrait image This image comprises the username and accompanying prefix icon
        Parameters:
        icon - - an icon to display left of the user's name
        username - - the username
        Returns:
        an Image of the chat portrait
        See Also:
        ChatIcon

      • getChatPortrait

        public static Image getChatPortrait(java.lang.String username)
        Retrieve the chat portrait of a username with no icon (Syntactic sugar for Font.CHAT.getStringImage(username...))
        Parameters:
        username - - the username
        Returns:
        a chat portrait for the username
